21634.en:
Oh ! We've been waiting for you! The Triad Axe that powers the transporter has finally been
completed!
21634.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>！　待っておったぞ！
　転送装置を動かす　三闘士のオノが
　ついに　完成したのじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21634.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc>! 기다렸다!
　전송 장치를 작동시킬 삼투사의 도끼를
　드디어 완성했다!<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21634.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>哦哦，<pc>！等你好久了！
运转传送装置的三斗士之斧
终于做好了！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21634.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>喔喔，<pc>！等你好久了！
運作傳送裝置的三鬥士之斧
終於做好了！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21635.en:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>Now you can go to Calsadora Volcano!
If I try, I can do it too!<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21635.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「これで　カルサドラ火山に行けるぞよ！
　余も　やれば　できるのじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21635.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: 이제 칼사드라 화산에 갈 수 있겠구나!
　나도 하면 되는 사내였어!<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21635.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>这样就可以前往卡尔萨多拉火山啰！
吾只要有心也是办得到的！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21635.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>這樣就可以前往卡爾薩朵拉火山囉！
吾只要有心也是辦得到的！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21636.en:
<start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Hmm! I can't believe you can make such
a big deal of it. I've failed to see
that about you!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21636.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「ふん！　そんな　たいそうなもんを
　こしらえることが　できるなんて……。
　アンタのこと　見損なったでごぜえますよッ！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21636.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 흥! 그런 엄청난 물건을
　만들 줄 알았다니…….
　제가 사람을 잘못 봤습니다!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21636.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>哼！竟然可以做出
这么厉害的东西……
我可真是错看你了！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21636.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>哼！竟然可以做出
這麼厲害的東西……
我可真是錯看你了！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21637.en:
<start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>You were the most sparkling and
shining when you were in a daze all
day long! I'll wake up soon!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21637.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「一日中　ぼーっとしてたときのアンタが
　いちばん　キラキラ　輝いていたですよッ！
　とっとと　目を覚ますでごぜえますッ！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21637.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 하루 종일 멍하니 있던 당신이
　가장 눈부시게 빛났습니다!
　이제 그만 정신 차리세요!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21637.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你一整天发呆时的样子，
是最闪闪发亮的啊！
赶快清醒过来吧！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21637.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>你一整天發呆時的樣子，
是最閃閃發亮的啊！
趕快清醒過來吧！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21638.en:
Are you ready? We're going to use the Triad Axe that Byan built and head for the crater area of
Calsadora Volcano.
21638.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「……<pc>　準備はいい？
　ビャンくんが作った　三闘士のオノを使って
　カルサドラ火山の　火口付近に向かうわよ。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21638.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: ……<pc>, 준비는 됐어?
　뱐이 만든 삼투사의 도끼를 사용해서
　칼사드라 화산 분화구 부근으로 가자.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21638.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>……<pc>，准备好了吗？
我要使用碧昂做的三斗士之斧，
前往卡尔萨多拉火山口附近了。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21638.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>……<pc>，準備好了嗎？
我要使用畢昂做的三鬥士之斧，
前往卡爾薩朵拉火山口附近了。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21639.en:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>And there we fight off the monsters
who are performing their shady
rituals!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21639.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「そして　そこで　あやしい儀式をしている
　魔物たちを　撃退するの！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21639.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 그리고 그곳에서 수상한 의식을
　벌이고 있는 마물들을 해치우는 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21639.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>然后扫荡在那进行
奇怪仪式的怪物们！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21639.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>然後掃蕩在那進行
奇怪儀式的怪物們！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21640.en:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>Hmmm. It must be Guryan Rush, the
kataki of my country, who leads these
monsters. Now is the time for revenge!<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21640.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「うむ。その魔物たちを率いるは
　我が祖国のカタキ　グルヤンラシュに相違ない。
　今こそ　復讐を果たすときぞ！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21640.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: 그래, 그 마물들을 이끄는 건
　내 조국의 원수 그루양라슈가 분명해.
　이번에야말로 조국의 복수를 할 것이다!<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21640.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>嗯！率领那些怪物的人，
一定就是祖国的仇敌，古鲁亚恩拉修。
现在正是复仇的好时机！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21640.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>嗯，率領那些怪物的人，
一定就是吾祖國的仇敵，古爾央拉修。
現在正是復仇的好時機！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21641.en:
The ancient transporter to the crater area is located in the center of the Raniakka Fault Zone, just south of the
Mogarim Highway.
21641.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「火口付近へと通じる　古代の転送装置は
　モガリム街道を　南に抜けた先の
　ラニアッカ断層帯の　中央辺りにある。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21641.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: 분화구 부근으로 가는 전송 장치는
　모가리움 가도 남쪽으로 빠져나가
　라니악카 단층대 중앙부로 가면 나올 거다.<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21641.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>通往火山口附近的古代传送装置，
就在摩加利姆街道南边
拉尼阿卡断层带的中央地带。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21641.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>通往火山口附近的古代傳送裝置，
就在摩加利姆幹道南邊
拉尼亞卡斷層帶的中央地帶。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21642.en:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>First, let's go to the Raniakka Fault
Zone and board the Calsadora Volcano!
And then my revenge will be over!<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21642.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「まずは　ラニアッカ断層帯へ行き
　カルサドラ火山に　乗り込むとしようぞ！
　そして　余の復讐に　終わりを告げるのじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21642.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: 우선 라니악카 단층대로 가
　칼사드라 화산으로 이동하자꾸나!
　그리고 내 복수에 종지부를 찍는 거다!<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21642.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>先前往拉尼阿卡断层带，
再到卡尔萨多拉火山吧！
然后吾就能完成复仇了！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21642.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>先前往拉尼亞卡斷層帶，
再到卡爾薩朵拉火山吧！
然後吾就能完成復仇了！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21643.en:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>Mm-hmm! Well said! Now let's go to the
Raniakka Fault Zone.<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21643.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「うむ！　よくぞ申した！
　それでは　ラニアッカ断層帯に
　足を運ぶとするぞよ。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21643.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: 좋아! 대답 한번 시원하구나!
　그럼 라니악카 단층대로
　출발하기로 하지.<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21643.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>嗯！说得好！
那就前往
拉尼阿卡断层带吧。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21643.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>嗯！說得好！
那就前往拉尼亞卡斷層帶吧。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21644.en:
The circular pedestal with the statue of Axe is the transporter. I will take the activation device, Triad Axe, so
please wait on the pedestal.
21644.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「オノの彫像がある　円形の台座が転送装置じゃ。
　起動器具の三闘士のオノは　余が持っていくゆえ
　台座の上で　待っていてたもれ。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21644.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: 도끼 조각상이 있는 원형 받침대가
　전송 장치니라. 기동 기구인 삼투사의 도끼는 
　내가 가져갈 테니 받침대 위에서 기다리거라.<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21644.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>有斧头雕像的圆形底座就是传送装置。
启动器具三斗士之斧由吾来拿，
所以你在底座上等着。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21644.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>有斧頭雕像的圓形底座就是傳送裝置。
啟動器具三鬥士之斧由吾來拿，
你在底座上等著。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21645.en:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>An ancient transporter in Raniakka,
huh? Okay, I'll go first then! I'll go
ahead then. I'll meet you over there!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21645.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「ラニアッカにある　古代の転送装置か……。
　よし！　それじゃ　私は先に行くね。
　向こうで　落ち合いましょう！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21645.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 라니악카에 있는 고대의 전송 장치라…….
　좋아! 그럼 난 먼저 출발할게.
　거기서 만나자!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21645.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>拉尼阿卡的古代传送装置啊……
好！那我先走了。
在目的地会合吧！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21645.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>拉尼亞卡的古代傳送裝置啊……
好！那我先走了。
在目的地會合吧！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21646.en:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>Well then <pc>. We shall
leave now. I will follow you.<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21646.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「それでは　<pc>。
　我らも　出立するとしようぞ。
　余は　そちの後を　ついていくでな。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21646.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: 그럼, <pc>.
　우리도 출발하자꾸나.
　난 네 뒤를 따라가겠다.<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21646.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>那么，<pc>。
吾等也出发吧。
吾会跟在你后面的。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21646.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>那麼，<pc>。
吾等也出發吧。
吾會跟在你後面的。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

21647.en:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>Mhm! It seems that you have so many
requests from the lower ranks that you
cannot accept my request.<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21647.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「……ムムッ！
　そちは　下々の者の依頼を　たくさん抱えており
　余の頼みは　受けられぬようじゃな。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21647.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: ……응!?
　이미 다른 평민들의 의뢰가 많아
　내 부탁을 들어줄 수 없는 것 같군.<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21647.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>……唔唔！
你似乎接受太多市井小民的委托，
无法处理吾的委托啊。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21647.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>……唔唔！
你似乎接受太多市井小民的委託，
無法處理吾的委託啊。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21648.en:
Oh, well. I'm a generous man. However, the time is of the essence. Please help me by finishing the request as
soon as possible.
21648.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「……まあ　よい。余は　寛大じゃからな。
　とはいえ　事態は　一刻を争うのじゃ。
　早急に依頼を片付け　余を手伝ってたもれ。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21648.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: ……뭐, 됐다. 난 관대하니까.
　하지만 지금은 한시가 급해.
　어서 의뢰를 처리하고 날 도우러 오거라.<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21648.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>……嗯，算了，吾是个宽宏大量的人。
不过情况紧急，分秒必争。
你赶快处理好其他委托，过来帮吾。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21648.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>……嗯，算了，吾是個寬宏大量的人。
不過情況緊急，分秒必爭。
你趕快處理好其他委託，過來幫吾。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21649.en:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>What a surprise! Amidst all this
battle flare, you are not inspired? I
have failed you, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21649.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「……なんと！　この出陣の気炎の中
　そちは　奮い立たぬと申すか！
　見損なったぞよ　<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21649.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: ……뭐라! 사기가 충천한 와중에
　그럼 김빠지는 소리를 하다니!
　네게 실망했다, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21649.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>……你说什么！在这股气势下，
你竟然说提不起劲！
真是错看你了，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21649.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>……你說什麼！在這股出陣的氣勢下，
你竟然說提不起勁嗎！
真是錯看你了，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21650.en:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>However, you are the only one I can
rely on. Don't say that and lend me a
hand. I'll be here. Come again.<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21650.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>「とはいえ　頼れるのは　そちしか　おらぬ。
　そう言わずに　手を貸してくれぬか。
　余は　ここにおるでな。また来てたもれ。<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21650.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그래도 부탁할 사람은 너뿐이다.
　그러지 말고 날 도와주지 않겠느냐?
　난 여기 있을 테니 나중에 다시 와 다오.<stop_lip_animation n01463 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21650.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01463 _normal m00001>不过也只有你能拜托了。
你别这么说，帮帮忙吧。
